## Introduction

### Project Overview
- Objective: Gain insights into the characteristics of the most popular tracks of 2023 on Spotify
- Dataset: Top 50 Songs on Spotify in 2023 (Kaggle)

### Research Questions
- What are the most common genres among the top tracks?
- Is there a correlation between track attributes (danceability, energy, tempo) and popularity?
- Can we predict track popularity based on its features?
